Posts.Content: There's a lot of different types of breast cancers.  Go through the page and see which one describes your situation best.  http://www.breastcancers.co.za/index.php?option=com_content&
Posts.Title: What type of breast cancer do you have?

Posts.Content: Here's a site where you can read more about your specific breast condition.  It helped me a lot... http://www.breastcancers.co.za/index.php?option=com_content&
Posts.Title: Breast Conditions

Posts.Content: Visit http://www.breastcancers.co.za for tips on preventing breast cancer.
Posts.Title: Breast Cancer Prevention and Tips
